errors.passwordUppercaseCharacter: Password must have at least one Uppercase Character.
errors.passwordLowercaseCharacter: Password must have at least one Lowercase Character.
errors.passwordOneDigit: Password must contain at least one Digit.
errors.passwordOneSpecialSymbol: Password must contain at least one Special Symbol.

new-wallet.passwordDescription: This password will unlock your ELLAsset wallet only on this service
new-wallet.notRecoverPassword: I understand that ELLAsset cannot recover this password for me.
new-wallet.writeDownYourSeedPhraseText: This is your seed phrase. Write it down on a paper and keep it in a safe place. You'll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) on the next step.
new-wallet.tapToRevealYourSeedPhrase: Tap to reveal your seed phrase
new-wallet.makeSureNoOneIsWatchingYourScreen: Make sure no one is watching your screen.
new-wallet.selectEachWord: Select each word in the order it was presented to you
new-wallet.congratulationsText1: You've successfully protected your wallet. Remember to keep your seed phrase safe, it's your responsibility!
new-wallet.congratulationsText2: ELLAsset cannot recover your wallet should you lose it. You can find your seedphrase in Setings > Security & Privacy

secure-your-wallet.text1-start: Don't risk losing your funds. protect your wallet by saving your
secure-your-wallet.text2: It's the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.

seed-phrase.text1: A seed phrase is a set of twelve words that contains all the information about your wallet, including your funds. It's like a secret code used to access your entire wallet.
seed-phrase.text2: You must keep your seed phrase secret and safe. If someone gets your seed phrase, they'll gain control over your accounts.
seed-phrase.text3: Save it in a place where only you can access it. If you lose it, not even MetaMask can help you recover it.

remind-me-later.consent: I dunderstand that if i lose mt seed phrase i will not be able to access my wallet

secure-your-wallet-next.text3: Write down your seed phrase on a piece of paper and store in a safe place.
secure-your-wallet-next.text4:
Risks are:  
• You lose it
• You forget where you put it
• Someone else finds it
secure-your-wallet-next.otherOptions: Other options: Doesn't have to be paper!
secure-your-wallet-next.tips:
Tips: 
• Store in bank vault  
• Store in a safe 
• Store in multiple secret places

why-is-it-important.text1: Dont’t risk losing your funds. Protect your wallet by saving your seed phrase in a place you trust.
why-is-it-important.text2: It’s the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.
